imdb.title: Fate/Apocrypha
imdb.plot: In an alternate universe, the Holy Grail War was won by the Yggdamillenia family. Now two factions with 7 Master-Servant pairs each and 1 extra Servant as the Ruler are fighting to win the Greater Holy Grail.

episodes.title: Gaiten: Seihai Taisen
episodes.plot: Kairi Sisigou is summoned by Rocco Belfeban, who reveals that Yggdmillennia has gone rogue. To obtain the power of the Holy Grail, the Clock Tower begins a new War between Yggdmillenia and the Tower.

episodes.title: Seijo no Shuttatsu
episodes.plot: Jeanne d'Arc is summoned as a Servant and is ordered to make sure the War proceeds as ordained. Each of the masters greet their Servants, with Sisigou introducing himself to Mordred.

episodes.title: Arukidasu Unmei
episodes.plot: The battles between the Servants begin. Karna attacks Jeanne only for Siegried to intervene. Caules talks with Frankenstein's monster as Chiron heals a Homunculus.

episodes.title: Sei no Daishou, Shi no Tsugunai
episodes.plot: Spartacus continues his attack on Yggdmillennia's castle. The Black Faction mounts a counterattack as the Red Faction sends more of it's own soldiers. Jeanne supervises the battle.

episodes.title: Ten no koe
episodes.plot: The Homunculus named Sieg awakens only to be caught in the middle of a battle. The Black Faction retreat when Jeanne intervenes and elsewhere Jack the Ripper goes on a rampage.

episodes.title: The Knight of Rebellion
episodes.plot: A series of mage murders is occurring, drawing attention from both factions. Mordred's past is revealed as the neglected child of King Arthur.

episodes.title: Where Freedom Lies
episodes.plot: The fight between Caules and Mordred ends in a draw. As various Servants follow their own objectives, Sieg begins to question the nature of his own existence.

episodes.title: The War Begins
episodes.plot: The Red Faction begins their attack on Castle Yggdmillennia as Shiro appears on the Hanging Gardens to fight himself. Loyalties are tested and alliances are offered as all out war continues.

episodes.title: Hundreds of Flames and Hundreds of Flowers
episodes.plot: The battle for the Holy Grail rages on as members from the Red and Black Factions start fighting head to head. Elsewhere, Darnic holds the Holy Grail and remembers how he stole it.

episodes.title: Scattered Flower
episodes.plot: Mordred goes on the offensive, and no attack can stop her. Sieg is killed, but is able to resurrect with a new form.

episodes.title: Eternal Radiance
episodes.plot: Atalanta leads forces into battle in the aftermath of several Noble Phantasms clashing at once. Some Servants are forced to retreat while others are only more fired up to continue fighting.

episodes.title: The Holy Man Returns Triumphant
episodes.plot: Darnic unleashes his final gambit, using his spells to turn Vlad into his ultimate form. The remaining Servants decide they need to put aside their differences to stop their overpowering foe.

episodes.title: The Last Master
episodes.plot: Shiro now possesses the Holy Grail and announces his plan to save humanity. Lines in the sand are drawn as Servants need to decide whose side they are going to be on when Shiro begins his plan.

episodes.title: Prayer of Salvation
episodes.plot: The Hanging Gardens fly away and Jeanne affirms Sieg's choice to officially enter the Holy Grail War. A powerful golem marches on the castle and the Servants must assemble to face it.

episodes.title: Though Our Paths Diverge
episodes.plot: Achilles, Atalanta, and Karna reluctantly work with Shiro in order to rescue their captured Masters, with each of them having their own objective. Shiro reveals to Mordred why he wants the Grail.

episodes.title: Jack the Ripper
episodes.plot: Sieg is slowly transforming into Siegfried himself, which is taking a toll on his body. Despite Jeanne's concerns, she and the others need to deal with Jack the Ripper, who has gone on another rampage.

episodes.title: Träumerei
episodes.plot: The group heads into Trifas to face Jack the Ripper and their mysterious Master. In the Hanging Gardens, Achilles has a conversation with Shiro about what he wants to do.

episodes.title: From Hell
episodes.plot: Jack the Ripper makes an attack on Sieg, Jeanne and Atalanta that divides them.

episodes.title: Dawn of the End
episodes.plot: Jeanne and the Yggdmillenia faction plan their assault on the Hanging Gardens.

episodes.title: Soar Through the Sky
episodes.plot: Jeanne, Sieg, Astolfo, Chiron, Fiore, and Caules begin their assault on the Hanging Gardens.

episodes.title: Antares Snipe
episodes.plot: Chiron and Achilles battle against each other.

episodes.title: Reunion and Farewell
episodes.plot: Achilles and Atlanta fight, while Sieg and Karna unleash their power.

episodes.title: Going Beyond
episodes.plot: Mordred and Sisigou make their last fight. Jeanne gets trapped in a nightmare.

episodes.title: The Holy Grail War
episodes.plot: Shirou appears to use the Grail to purge humanity of sin, but Sieg fights him.

episodes.title: Apocrypha
episodes.plot: Sieg has finally acquired the Holy Grail, but what will he do with it?
